dublin_core.dcvalue: Myocardial infarction is the third leading cause of death in the developing countries Thrombolysis as a reperfusion therapy is shown to have a great role in decreasing mortality The efficacy of thrombolytic therapy lies in its ability to reduce the duration of occlusion by early administration Many of the studies have supported pre hospital thrombolysis PHT therapy and proven that it is beneficial in acute myocardial infarction AMI patients
International journal of applied And basic medical research
Paramedics beliefs and attitudes towards pre-hospital thrombolysis.
